name: Jumanji Next Level
synopsis: Bla bla bla

name: Killers of the Flower Moon
synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

name: Dicks: The Musical
synopsis: A pair of business rivals discover that they're identical twins and decide to swap places in an attempt to trick their divorced parents to get back together.

name: Expend4bles
synopsis: Armed with every weapon they can get their hands on and the skills to use them, The Expendables are the world’s last line of defense and the team that gets called when all other options are off the table. But new team members with new styles and tactics are going to give “new blood” a whole new meaning.

name: Saw X
synopsis: Between the events of 'Saw' and 'Saw II', a sick and desperate John Kramer travels to Mexico for a risky and experimental medical procedure in hopes of a miracle cure for his cancer, only to discover the entire operation is a scam to defraud the most vulnerable. Armed with a newfound purpose, the infamous serial killer returns to his work, turning the tables on the con artists in his signature visceral way through devious, deranged, and ingenious traps.

name: TAYLOR SWIFT | THE ERAS TOUR
synopsis: The cultural phenomenon continues on the big screen! Immerse yourself in this once-in-a-lifetime concert film experience with a breathtaking, cinematic view of the history-making tour.

name: Jeanne du Barry (2023)
synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu, who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's
synopsis: Recently fired and desperate for work, a troubled young man named Mike agrees to take a position as a night security guard at an abandoned theme restaurant: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria. But he soon discovers that nothing at Freddy's is what it seems.

name: Alena: Anak Ratu Iblis
synopsis: Hendra and Maya found a small child on their way home. The couple, who were not blessed with children, adopted the child and named it Alena. Since being adopted, Alena has had a positive impact on the family. Hendra, who was previously not very successful in his business, began to feel a drastic change toward success. Hendra and Maya's happiness was complete when they were blessed with a child they were looking forward to. However, irregularities begin to be felt. Everything turns into a disaster until it becomes life-threatening. The cause of the catastrophe turns out to be Alena, the daughter of the Devil Queen.

name: Puisi Cinta yang Membunuh
synopsis: Words of poetry spell certain death when a young woman grows increasingly distraught after a string of unusual murders take place.

name: Anak Titipan Setan
synopsis: Eyang Susana made a gift agreement with a demon named 'Jaran Penoleh'. The agreement made her have to prepare sacrifices in the form of 10 year old children to the devil. If can't, then Eyang Susana's life will be at stake.

name: Hidayah
synopsis: Bahri, a young man who lives in Mekarsari Village. One day, Bahri realized that something was wrong in Mekarsari Village. Out of curiosity, he also found out what was really going on in the village where he lived.

name: Bayi Ajaib
synopsis: A newly rich and recently married man's comfortable life threatens to crumble when his infant child is possessed by an unholy spirit with a grudge.

name: Jalan yang Jauh, Jangan Lupa Pulang
synopsis: Studying abroad in London, Aurora struggles with her relationships while away from her family in this sequel to One Day We'll Talk About Today.

name: Tanpa Ampun
synopsis: Based on real events, four professional bank robbers and ATM machine breakers from Russia go on rampage in Bali. The Balinese police force are in hot pursuit to catch the robbers.

name: Tasbih Kosong
synopsis: Asti and Umar, the employees of a Statistics Office, are assigned to update data in a remote village in a district in Sulawesi. Umar and Asti do not realize that the place where they are taking shelter is the house of the man who made a deal with the devil to become rich instantly. Difficult road access and long distances between houses become obstacles, so they are forced to live in the village for quite a long time. One day, Umar meets Rajeng, and they fall in love. Unknowingly, Rajeng entered into an agreement with her adoptive parents as the successor to the black magic they had. The arrival of Asti and Umar exposes various guises of the local villagers. Asti and Umar's lives begin to feel threatened.

name: Waktu Maghrib
synopsis: In a village there is a girl who says goodbye to the mosque to pray maghrib to her father.

name: Gita Cinta dari SMA
synopsis: Love slowly grows when the new girl in school meets an unassuming boy from a run-down part of town, but her disapproving father stops them at every turn.

name: Virgo and the Sparklings
synopsis: Riani, a teenager who is forced to reveal her hidden powers when several mysterious cases occur and turn the city into chaos.

name: Kembang Api
synopsis: 4 people intend to commit suicide together by blowing themselves up using a large ball of fireworks.

name: Perjanjian Gaib
synopsis: Andri and Wati are a young couple who are willing to do anything for money, even supernatural things like 'praying' at a sacred grave.

name: Iblis Dalam Darah
synopsis: Haruni screams in pain of being possessed by a devil. Besides being in pain, she also tends to hurt herself. Haruni's sister, Hanum, has glaucoma. Dr. Ahmad, who is treating Hanum, hears Haruni's story. He then treats Haruni during the night of the recitation. Haruni's body spasms violently, manage to realese_date all the bonds on her body and jumps into the window of the house's second floor. Ahmad suspects that Haruni has a connection with a suicide case. The body of the person who killed himself was also possessed by the demon flowing in Haruni's blood. Ahmad and a police friend help Haruni's problems, looking for data on the man who had committed suicide and expelling the evil spirit from Haruni's body.

name: Losmen Melati
synopsis: Seeking shelter in a forgotten part of town, travelers get trapped inside a cursed motel - while its host forces them to face its darkest terrors.

name: Kartu Pos Wini
synopsis: A post office employee who wants to help a little girl with blood cancer find her hope.

name: Kutukan Cakar Monyet
synopsis: A greedy husband and wife use a monkey claw amulet given by a shaman so they can get rich quickly.

name: Buya Hamka Vol. I
synopsis: This sweeping biopic captures the life of renowned Muslim scholar Buya Hamka, from his humble West Sumatra origins to his political achievements.

name: Sewu Dino
synopsis: Sri is tasked to do a cleansing ritual for Dela Atmojo, an unconscious girl who is suffering from 1000 days-hex. The terror begins when her friend neglects to finish the ritual. Failing until the 1000th day will result in their demise.

name: Khanzab
synopsis: After his father was beheaded by ninjas in Banyuwangi '98, Rahayu was traumatized to the point where he found it difficult to concentrate on his prayers due to interference from the khanzab.

name: Dedemit - Diikuti Makhluk Halus
synopsis: After her sister's death, a woman goes to Makassar to uncover her father's secret legacy house and encounters a mysterious woman guarding the well-maintained property.

name: Angel: Kami Semua Punya Mimpi
synopsis: A guilt-ridden young woman who moves to Jogja to escape the memory of her brother meets a man with autism and with the help of a new friend, sets out to make his dream of playing with his idol a reality.

name: Hello Ghost
synopsis: After a failed suicide attempt, Kresna is pursued by four ghosts who will only leave him alone if he fulfills their requests, leading him to find a new meaning in life and love for Nurse Linda.

name: Bukannya Aku Tidak Mau Nikah
synopsis: A woman finds her true love in Bali but gets caught in a dilemma between choosing her fiancé or following her heart.

name: Kajiman: Iblis Terkejam Penagih Janji
synopsis: A nurse experiences supernatural terror while caring for an elderly patient and seeks help from a friend to uncover a dark ritual.

name: Detektif Jaga Jarak
synopsis: In their quest to prove infidelity and ensure a successful marriage, Almond and Takdir embark on a thrilling adventure as detectives, uncovering cases of betrayal and deception.

name: Spirit Doll
synopsis: After a renowned horror actress, Dara Lazuardi, encounters a haunted doll resembling her deceased daughter, she becomes convinced of its connection to her child's spirit, leading her into a spiral of madness as others try to intervene.

name: Kutukan Sembilan Setan
synopsis: Five friends encounter terrifying demons and unravel the mysteries of an old villa during their vacation in Bromo, leading to conflicts and revelations about the dark secrets of its past.

name: Star Syndrome
synopsis: A former lead vocalist of a highly acclaimed band tries to regain his popularity in the music industry, which has evolved significantly since his prime.

name: Sosok Ketiga
synopsis: Anton's marriage to Yuni, his wife's friend, triggers a series of supernatural terrors and conflicts, leaving Nuri disappointed and Yuni's mother fearing for the safety of her child and future grandchildren.

name: Kejar Mimpi, Gaspol!
synopsis: A single mother from Bromo does not dare to pursue her dream and carry out her passion, which is writing, because she thinks that her only duty is to make her daughter's dream come true.

name: Tari Kematian
synopsis: Kinara (Clarice Cutie), a class X high school student, dreams of becoming a skilled dancer like her mother. Meanwhile, her mother, Diah (Lilis Suganda), has been experiencing delusional disorders since her husband left. Diah does not support Kinara's decision to become a dancer. Moreover, Kinara is not good at dancing so she is often made fun of by her friends at the school dance studio. A strange incident occurred when he was on a study tour to an island. He learned an ancient dance that was forbidden because it was considered deadly. His return from the island made him a skilled dancer. However, this actually put the lives of his friends and loved ones at risk.

name: Jendela Seribu Sungai
synopsis: Three children with stifled dreams meet a mentor who helps them overcome societal expectations and pursue their true passions.

name: Kutukan Peti Mati
synopsis: Bramanto Putra, an archaeology student, found an ancient notebook on Onrust Island that had been buried for 300 years.

name: Mantra Surugana
synopsis: The story revolves around a new female college student in a dormitory filled with mysterious occurrences due to the awakening of a demon through an incantation and curse that still holds a connection to her own past.

name: Suzzanna: Malam Jumat Kliwon
synopsis: Suzzanna was bewitched on a Kliwon Friday night. She came back for revenge, in the form of Sundel Bolong.

name: Primbon
synopsis: Amidst a mountain climbing trip, Rana goes missing, but miraculously returns home, causing a conflict between her mother's belief in her survival and the superstitious extended family.

name: Dear Jo: Almost is Never Enough
synopsis: After the tragic death of Maura, Ella and Joshua's lives are shattered as Ella carries Maura's child, navigating grief, parenthood, and unexpected challenges.

name: Lantai 4
synopsis: Jonathan's family moves into a haunted apartment after facing financial ruin, where they experience terrifying paranormal activities endangering their lives.

name: Catatan Si Boy
synopsis: Boy, a perfect student, faces heartbreak and confusion when his beloved girlfriend disappears, leading to a new romance that is threatened by the return of his ex-girlfriend.

name: Orpa
synopsis: A teenage girl with a tragic life is desperate to run away from her village to continue her education even though she has to go through the ferocity of the Papuan Jungle

name: Sleep Call
synopsis: Dina's escape from loneliness into an addictive 'sleep call' relationship turns deadly as unexplained deaths emerge.

name: Air Mata di Ujung Sajadah
synopsis: Aqilla discovers her long-lost son, Baskara, but faces a moral dilemma as he has been raised by another couple; a heartfelt struggle ensues.

name: Jomblo Fi Sabilillah
synopsis: Three friends with commitment issues help panic-stricken Ali, who's afraid of women, find love while navigating their own romantic struggles.

name: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati: Desa Bunuh Diri
synopsis: Siena and her friends uncover a mystery when deaths occur without warning, leading them to Remetuk Village and a dark curse.

name: Pamali: Dusun Pocong
synopsis: A gravedigger and students breaking a taboo by whistling at night face a horde of pocong apparitions.

name: Bangku Kosong: Ujian Terakhir
synopsis: A peaceful school exam day turns into a nightmare when a terrifying dark force possesses and terrorizes high-achieving students, causing mass hysteria and death.

name: Imam Tanpa Makmum
synopsis: Imam falls in love with Naira, a violinist who owns a shelter for street children. Imam called her Humaira like the Prophet Muhammad's nickname for Siti Aisyah. Mamak disapproves of the relationship because Naira works at a nightclub.

name: Saranjana: Kota Ghaib
synopsis: When Shita, the lead singer of a major band goes missing, the band goes on a search, finding out that Shita is in Saranjana, a supernatural city, and to bring him back they must find a portal through an adventure of mystical events.

name: Mohon Doa Restu
synopsis: When Mel and Satya plans to get married. Three months before the wedding, Mel suddenly has a anxiety on whether he really wants Satya in his future.

name: Nona Manis Sayange
synopsis: Akram has to fight hard to fulfill Sika's father's expectations. She faced exorbitant dowry demands, demands that were difficult to meet.

name: Kultus Iblis
synopsis: A pair of twins come to a remote village to find out the cause of their father's strange death, but they end up trapped in a dangerous village full of terror.

name: Sijjin
synopsis: A young woman who uses black magic to threaten her cousin's wife.

name: Gampang Cuan
synopsis: The brothers' struggle to find money to save the family from debt, without the mother's knowledge.

name: Budi Pekerti
synopsis: After a viral altercation, Prani, a guidance counselor, faces backlash endangering her career and family.

name: Puisi Cinta yang Membunuh
synopsis: Words of poetry spell certain death when a young woman grows increasingly distraught after a string of unusual murders take place.

name: Anak Titipan Setan
synopsis: Eyang Susana made a gift agreement with a demon named 'Jaran Penoleh'. The agreement made her have to prepare sacrifices in the form of 10 year old children to the devil. If can't, then Eyang Susana's life will be at stake.

name: Hidayah
synopsis: Bahri, a young man who lives in Mekarsari Village. One day, Bahri realized that something was wrong in Mekarsari Village. Out of curiosity, he also found out what was really going on in the village where he lived.

name: Bayi Ajaib
synopsis: A newly rich and recently married man's comfortable life threatens to crumble when his infant child is possessed by an unholy spirit with a grudge.

name: Jalan yang Jauh, Jangan Lupa Pulang
synopsis: Studying abroad in London, Aurora struggles with her relationships while away from her family in this sequel to One Day We'll Talk About Today.
